name: Bunny <3 Bear
description:
♥   Based on a true story about how I met my spouse.  Everyone talks about finding love, but I just want to find a friend.  While learning multiple languages in school, I tried to search for a language partner  for language practice. However, I had to shift through many frogs before I found a friend and not too long after my partner. ♥ 

  #truestory #myeverafter

                                                           

Bunny <3 Bear was created in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy engine and includes a few very simple levels to test out what is possible with the Bitsy editor. 

Bitsy currently doesn't support audio.
